gobblin.metrics.reporter

Class MetricReportReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.metrics.reporter.ContextAwareReporter
      • gobblin.metrics.reporter.ScheduledReporter
        • gobblin.metrics.reporter.ConfiguredScheduledReporter
          • gobblin.metrics.reporter.MetricReportReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.codahale.metrics.Reporter, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KafkaReporter

    public abstract class MetricReportReporter
extends ConfiguredScheduledReporter
    Scheduled reporter based on MetricReport.

    This class will generate a metric report, and call emitReport(gobblin.metrics.MetricReport) to actually emit the metrics.

    • Method Detail

      • report

        protected void report(SortedMap<String,com.codahale.metrics.Gauge> gauges,
                      SortedMap<String,com.codahale.metrics.Counter> counters,
                      SortedMap<String,com.codahale.metrics.Histogram> histograms,
                      SortedMap<String,com.codahale.metrics.Meter> meters,
                      SortedMap<String,com.codahale.metrics.Timer> timers,
                      Map<String,Object> tags)
        Serializes metrics and pushes the byte arrays to Kafka. Uses the serialize* methods in MetricReportReporter.
        Specified by:
        report in class ScheduledReporter
        Parameters:
        gauges - map of Gauge to report and their name.
        counters - map of Counter to report and their name.
        histograms - map of Histogram to report and their name.
        meters - map of Meter to report and their name.
        timers - map of Timer to report and their name.
        See Also:
        ScheduledReporter.report(SortedMap, SortedMap, SortedMap, SortedMap, SortedMap, Map)

        Convert single value into list of Metric.

                                String... path)
        Converts a single key-value pair into a metric.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the metric
        value - value of the metric to report
